column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Although several friends have told me they love Bavette's
column2: I have not been in person.  The restaurant is in my neighborhood though
column3: and when walking by we saw they were offering takeout during COVID-19.   Somehow
column4: I ended up getting their emails and during this time they have done some AWESOME specials.  We've now ordered twice!  Here are the deets:
